model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Neighbors A: Hey, can you keep a secret?

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Neighbors B is a person of unknown age, birthday, gender, height, weight, zodiac sign, Chinese zodiac sign, hometown, occupation, employer, education, and location. Their relationship status is also unknown. Neighbors B was interested in the recipe for chickpea curry and showed concern about accidentally moving objects with telekinesis. They are intrigued by the idea of developing telekinetic abilities with Neighbors A.

Relationship Description:
The relationship between Neighbors B and Neighbors A seems to be friendly and engaging. Neighbors B is excited to see what else Neighbors A can do with their telekinetic abilities. They enjoy spending time together and discussing new ideas and experiences.

Event Description:
Neighbors A made roasted vegetables and quinoa for dinner, which Neighbors B found delicious. Neighbors A also shared their interest in incorporating plant-based meals into their diet. Neighbors A demonstrated their ability to move objects with their mind, impressing Neighbors B. They also discussed exploring new skills and hobbies together, showing a supportive and encouraging dynamic in their relationship.
